The first ASML lithography scanner was installed to produce 2nm chips using Low-NA EUV technology Somewhat overlooked in the context of recent advances between Intel and ASML is the fact that chipmakers hope to master 2nm production without switching to the use of more expensive EUV high-numerical aperture (High-NA) scanners. It is expected that this scanner will be able to process about 220 silicon wafers per hour versus the previous 160 pieces, justifying its high price with adequate performance, because the equipment for EUV lithography of the previous generation, to put it mildly, was not very fast.  This equipment, according to AnandTechis characterized by a Low Numerical Aperture (Low-NA) value of 0.33, but compared to the previous generation of ASML lithography scanners, it offers increased productivity and a more reasonable cost compared to high NA scanners. column3: [{'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/salesforce-introduces-the-pro-suite-to-expand-its-presence-in-the-smb-market/', 'published date': 'Wed, 13 Mar 2024 04:22:05 GMT', 'title': "Salesforce introduces the 'Pro Suite' to expand its presence in the SMB market - Global Village space", 'content': 'Salesforce introduces the ‘Pro Suite’ to expand its presence in the SMB market Salesforce, one of the leading customer relationship management (CRM) companies, is expanding its presence in the small and medium-sized business (SMB) market with the launch of its “Pro Suite” offering. According to Kris Billmaier, SVP and GM of self-service and growth at Salesforce, many customers have already upgraded from the Starter Suite to the Pro Suite due to the need for customization and advanced features. The Pro Suite unlocks additional capabilities across marketing, sales, service, and commerce, as well as access to AppExchange solutions, process automation with Flow, a dedicated sandbox for testing and training, and support for custom apps and objects. With its advanced features, customizable options, and AI capabilities, the Pro Suite provides SMBs with the tools they need to streamline their business workflows and drive growth. While both the Starter and Pro Suites currently offer basic predictive AI features like Einstein Activity Capture and Send Time Optimization, Salesforce plans to introduce more advanced generative AI capabilities with Einstein Copilot in the future.', 'score': 0.7901778221130371}, {'url': 'https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-03-11/oracle-sales-beat-estimates-as-cloud-growth-stabilizes', 'published date': 'Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:22:37 GMT', 'title': 'Oracle Sales Beat Estimates as Cloud Growth Stabilizes - Bloomberg', 'content': 'Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Oracle Jumps as ‘Large’ New Cloud Contracts Spur Revenue Growth Oracle headquarter in Redwood Shores, California.  Oracle Corp. surged 11% after signaling that growth in its closely watched cloud computing business is stabilizing, showing progress in its bid to capture more market share in the competitive market.  Cloud revenue jumped 25% to $5.1 billion in the period that ended in February, the company said Monday in a statementBloomberg Terminal, surpassing Wall Street’s $5.06 billion estimate. Of that, $1.8 billion came from renting out computing power and storage over the internet and $3.3 billion from applications.', 'score': 0.766682505607605}, {'url': 'https://wwd.com/business-news/retail/macys-inc-hires-michael-krans-to-run-media-network-1236259325/', 'published date': 'Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:11:10 GMT', 'title': "Macy's Inc. While SpaceX waited for the launch license from the FAA, teams continued working on preparing Ship 28 and Booster 10, including installing the Flight Termination System on Ship 10 before it was stacked back on top of Booster 10 for the final time.  The company is still targeting the morning of Thursday, March 14th, while they await the launch license from the Federal Aviation Administration, which could come at any time between now and the evening before launch.  Previous attempts aimed for a splash down North of the Hawaiian Islands, but with IFT-3, SpaceX is aiming for another suborbital trajectory with a splash down just East of Madagascar in the Indian Ocean. ', 'score': 0.7957027554512024}, {'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/tesla-cybertruck-flipping-threats-a-serious-matter/', 'published date': 'Tue, 12 Mar 2024 17:21:37 GMT', 'title': 'Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter - Global Village space', 'content': 'Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter The highly anticipated Tesla Cybertruck has garnered an impressive number of reservations since its announcement, prompting the American automaker to take strict measures against those attempting to flip the electric pickup truck for a quick profit. As the Cybertruck continues to generate excitement and demand, Tesla’s actions send a clear message that they will not tolerate attempts to exploit their vehicles for personal gain.  In conclusion, Tesla’s crackdown on individuals attempting to flip the Cybertruck for profit demonstrates the automaker’s commitment to protecting genuine buyers. The forum user, known as malinecentral, recounted their encounter with Tesla’s Loss and Prevention team, as well as a store leader, who informed them that their other two truck reservations had been canceled. This firm stance by Tesla reflects their commitment to ensuring that genuine buyers have fair access to their vehicles, without falling victim to opportunistic flippers. column2: Elevate Nvidia's Email Campaigns with AI Personalization
column3: Elevate Your Email Campaigns with Salesforce's AI Revolution
column4: Elevate Tesla's Email Campaigns with AI-Powered Personalization
column5: Elevate Bloomgberg.com's Email Marketing with AI

column2:
Hello Terry,

I trust this email finds you thriving. As a Marketing Strategist at Nvidia, a pioneer in AI and technology, you're continually pushing the boundaries of innovation. It's with this spirit in mind that I introduce an advanced tool designed to revolutionize Nvidia's email marketing approach.

In the fast-paced world of technology, the ability to stay ahead with cutting-edge marketing strategies is invaluable. Our product is a testament to this, offering a sophisticated mass email generator that not only automates your campaigns but personalizes them with unmatched precision through AI-driven insights.

Nvidia.net's reputation for leading in innovation aligns perfectly with our product's capabilities. By leveraging AI in a manner akin to Nvidia's exploration of its vast potential, our email generator customizes communication to an unprecedented degree, ensuring your messages deeply resonate with each recipient.

Whether it's engaging with the latest trends or highlighting groundbreaking advancements in AI, our tool positions your marketing strategy as dynamically and forward-thinking as Nvidia itself. Envision the impact of delivering personalized emails that not only cater to the individual interests of your recipients but are also timely and informed by the latest industry developments.

We are confident that our AI-driven solution could significantly enhance Nvidia.net's marketing initiatives, fostering engagement and driving unprecedented results. If the prospect of elevating your email marketing with our innovative tool intrigues you, I'm eager to discuss how we can customize it to meet Nvidia's distinct needs.

Best regards,

Omer Nauer
Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com
column3:
Dear Omer Nauer,

I hope this finds you thriving at Streak. As a passionate Marketing Coordinator at Salesforce, I've seen how our innovative solutions help businesses like yours soar. I'm thrilled to introduce something game-changing: our AI-powered mass email generator.

Salesforce's 'Pro Suite' is our latest offering, crafted for the SMB market. It's packed with features like predictive AI, including Einstein Activity Capture and Send Time Optimization. But we're most excited about Einstein Copilot, our advanced generative AI tool. It's set to revolutionize email personalization, enabling you to send highly customized emails at scale, effortlessly.

With Einstein Copilot, say goodbye to manual segmentation. This AI-driven technology not only streamlines your process but also elevates engagement rates, fostering deeper connections with your audience.

Integrating Einstein Copilot means your business can achieve unparalleled efficiency and impact in your communications. I'm keen to show you how this can transform Streak's email strategy, making it more personalized and effective.

Could we schedule a call or meeting next week to dive deeper into this? I'm looking forward to discussing your objectives and how Salesforce's innovations can support them.

Warm regards,
Michael Davis
Marketing Coordinator, Salesforce
michaeld@salesforce.com

P.S. Discover how the Pro Suite can redefine your email campaigns [here](https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/salesforce-introduces-the-pro-suite-to-expand-its-presence-in-the-smb-market/). Let's achieve greatness together.
column4:
Dear Dr. Logan Sandoval,

I hope this message finds you in good spirits. At Tesla, your commitment to innovation and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the automotive industry is not just renowned but truly inspirational. Your efforts in advancing electric vehicles and smart technology are transforming the future of transportation.

At Streak, we share your passion for innovation, especially when it comes to leveraging technology to enhance our daily lives and work. That’s why I'm thrilled to introduce our newest breakthrough - an AI-powered email generator designed to revolutionize email marketing campaigns for visionary companies like Tesla.

This tool isn't just about sending emails; it's about crafting personalized narratives for each recipient, ensuring that every communication feels as bespoke and innovative as a Tesla vehicle. Imagine the ability to engage your customers on a new level, with each email tailored to resonate with their unique interests and interactions with your brand.

I believe this technology could be a game-changer in how Tesla communicates with its community, fostering deeper connections and enhancing customer satisfaction. I would be delighted to discuss how our AI-powered email generator can complement Tesla's marketing strategies and help you achieve even greater success.

I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate and bring a new dimension to your communication strategies.

Best regards,

Omer Nauer
Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com
column5:
Dear Tina Ross,

In the dynamic landscape of brand management, staying innovative is key. At Streak, we're aware of the hurdles you encounter at Bloomgberg.com, especially when it comes to engaging your audience through effective, personalized communication. That's why we're thrilled to present our latest breakthrough: a comprehensive mass email generator powered by sophisticated AI.

This tool is set to redefine your connection with your audience. By harnessing the power of AI, it customizes each email based on in-depth analysis, ensuring your messages deeply resonate with every recipient. Imagine the impact of emails that are precisely tailored to your audience's interests and the latest industry trends.

I've observed Bloomgberg.com's keen interest in global market dynamics, the resilience of the Chinese cinema industry, and innovative sustainability projects like Cargill's glass-like sails. Our AI platform can seamlessly weave these and other evolving trends into your email campaigns, making your content not only personalized but also exceptionally timely and relevant.

In an era where email overload can dull the impact of digital communication, it's crucial to stand out. Our tool enables you to do just that, by dispatching emails crafted to engage, inform, and captivate. From sharing insights from the latest Bloomberg reports to customizing messages based on current global events, our platform empowers you to revolutionize your email marketing strategy.

I'm eager to explore how our AI-driven email generator can specifically serve Bloomgberg.com. Could we schedule a brief call next week to discuss this further? Together, we can aim to not only meet but vastly surpass your marketing goals.

Warm regards,

Omer Nauer
Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com

column2: The edits focused on making the email more concise and direct while emphasizing the personalized and innovative aspects of the product in relation to Nvidia's pioneering role in technology and AI. The introduction was streamlined for brevity and to quickly engage Terry’s interest. Technical jargon was minimized to make the email more accessible, and the benefits of the product were highlighted in a manner that directly relates to Nvidia's objectives and industry leadership. This approach aims to make the proposal more compelling and relevant to Terry's role and Nvidia's strategies. To further tailor the email, specific references or overly broad examples were avoided, focusing instead on the core value proposition of the product.
column3: The email has been edited for a more engaging and conversational tone, aiming to make the reader feel personally addressed and the content more accessible. The introduction has been streamlined to quickly capture interest. Technical jargon has been simplified to ensure the message is clear and the benefits of the product are front and center. The call to action is more inviting, subtly encouraging a discussion rather than a formal meeting. These changes aim to enhance readability and foster a connection with the recipient.
column4: The original email was streamlined to make it more concise and directly relevant to the recipient's interests. References not directly related to the main point, such as the Porsche Macan EV and Elon Musk's visit to Giga Berlin, were removed to maintain focus on the AI-powered email generator and its benefits to Tesla. The language was adjusted to be more engaging and to emphasize the parallels between Streak's innovation goals and Tesla's pioneering spirit. The purpose of these changes is to enhance clarity, relevance, and the persuasive appeal of the email, aiming for a more impactful and focused message.
column5: The email was edited to enhance clarity and engagement. The subject line was refined to directly address the recipient's affiliation (Bloomgberg.com) and hint at the value proposition. The body was adjusted for better readability, with shorter paragraphs and a more direct approach to explaining the benefits of the product. Specific examples related to Bloomgberg.com's interests were kept to illustrate the AI's capability for relevance and personalization. A call to action was clearly defined, inviting Tina Ross for a discussion, emphasizing the collaborative potential. The sign-off was made warmer to foster a sense of connection.
